sentences.sContent: It improves the strength and mobility of joints.
sentences.sCn: 它能提高关节的力量和灵活性。

sentences.sContent: ...what they might otherwise do if their mobility weren't so heavily...
...if we care about upward mobility overall...
...Increased inequality and decreasing mobility pose a fundamental threat to the American Dream...
...the following three seem to be most predictive of upward mobility in a given community...
